# Calendars entitlement

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may have read-write access to the user’s calendar.

## Discussion

To add this entitlement to your app, first enable the App Sandbox or Hardened Runtime capability in Xcode, and then select Calendar.

## Personal information

- **Address book entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may have read-write access to contacts in the user’s address book.
- **Location entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may access location information from Location Services.
- **Photos Library Entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app has read-write access to the user’s Photos library.
